word: THREE OF THE FIRST ELEVEN TREASURERS OF THE GENERAL CONFERENCE (1871-1883) WERE WOMEN.  OF THE NINETEEN EDITORS OF THE YOUTH'S INSTRUCTOR WHO SERVED BETWEEN 1852 AND 1899, ELEVEN WERE WOMEN.  L. FLORA PLUMMER HEADED THE SABBATH SCHOOL DEPARTMENT OF THE GENERAL CONFERENCE FOR 23 YEARS.  THE ADVENTIST CHURCH DURING 1878-1910 LICENSED 31 WOMEN TO PREACH.
